ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(contains( $Profile.Name, "Admin")), NOT(contains( $Profile.Name, "Customer Success Manager")),
OR( ISBLANK(Incremental_ARR__c), ISBLANK(CloseDate) ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "5 - Sales Closed Won"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out Incremental ARR field, Close Date before moving it to Closed Won. The Opportunity Incremental ARR is the change to the Account ARR. For NB, it is the contract value. For expansion, this is the delta. For flat renewals, IARR is 0.
